Name: Sage
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en otoño. Tardan 5 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im  Herbst. Wächst in 5 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket ősszel ültesd el. 5 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 秋植えの作物。そだつのに5日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no outono. Demora 5 dias para amadurecer.
